sentence.text: We studied a consanguineous Pakistani family with postnatal microcephaly, orofacial dyskinesia, spastic quadriplegia and, on MRI, cortical atrophy with myelination delay, suggestive of a negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated-like presentation.

The regulation of the post-mitotic neural survival activity of negative regulation of I-kappaB kinase/NF-kappaB signaling depends critically on an interaction with negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated, a gene shown to be involved in a postnatal microcephaly syndrome.

entity.text: negative regulation of I-kappaB kinase/NF-kappaB signaling
